topic: How to Read Research Papers without Drowning: A Three-Pass Method
target_audience: students entering research-heavy courses or projects

refs.content: Outlines a three-pass approach for efficiently understanding and classifying papers; practical heuristics for newcomers.
Concrete tactics for targeted reading, note structuring, and building a related-work map.

special_instructions: Include a one-page reading worksheet, red flags for weak studies, and a citation tracker template.
